item.title: Practical performance when modernizing cloud apps - Events
item.description: We will talk about modernizing today’s code bases and explore how we use new features of the language and runtime within our own library and app code. There's certainly tons of performance work, but it's also about making the code easier to read, easier to write and more maintainable. We’ll learn practical performance tips by using modern techniques around span, stackalloc and more. Increase readability through u8 literal strings, speed application development through tuples and records, and improve maintainability through nullability annotations.  Breakout: BRK204H | English (US) This session was delivered as part of the Microsoft Ignite 2022 event. Discover and watch more on-demand videos from Microsoft Ignite 2022 Next Step Microsoft Learn Collection Recommended resources Learn at Ignite
item.author: (adriangalvarez)

item.title: Get up to speed with .NET - Events
item.description: Updates to technology and services happen all the time and it’s hard to keep up! .NET is no exception to that but right here at the Reactor we’ve got you covered. This new pre-.NET conf series seeks to introduce .NET to new developers and get current developers up to speed with current .NET features and give them all they need to make the most out of .NET conf 2022!
